product_name: Camaro Aqua Skin Bikini Top - Women's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: The Camaro Aqua Skin bikini top delivers coverage and an athletic design that allows the mobility you need to swim, paddle or play in the surf in comfort. Quick-drying nylon/elastane fabric blend offers light insulation for continued warmth once out of the water. Fabric features UPF 50 protection to shield your skin from harmful ultraviolet rays. Closeout.
short_description: The Camaro Aqua Skin bikini top delivers coverage and an athletic design that allows the mobility you need to swim, paddle or play in the surf in comfort.
